text: I care to live only to entice people to look at natures loveliness
author: John Muir

text: The mountains are calling and I must go
author: John Muir

text: But in every walk wiht nature one recieves far more than he seeks
author: John Muir

text: You can never conquer the mountain. You can only conquer yourself
author: Jim Whittaker

text: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far they can go
author: T.S. Eliot

text: The best view comes after the hardest climb
author: Unknown

text: May your dreams be larger than mountains and may you have the courage to scale their summits
author: Harley King

text: Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit
author: Edward Abbey

text: The power of imagination makes us infinite
author: John Muir
